pullrequest.title: Fix missing shadows and normal maps when using ogre 1.9

content.raw: The glsl files are part of ogre samples. There is a [ogre-samples-data](http://packages.ubuntu.com/precise/ogre-samples-data) package in precise but I can't find one in trusty.  We're adapting few files but with our own modifications to create the desired shadow effect and to fix the normal map bug.
content.html: The glsl files are part of ogre samples. There is a ogre-samples-data package in precise but I can't find one in trusty. We're adapting few files but with our own modifications to create the desired shadow effect and to fix the normal map bug.
